        public HourlyProgrammer​(java.lang.String firstName,
                        java.lang.String lastName,
                        java.lang.String socialSecurityNumber,
                        double wage,
                        double hours)
        All argument constructor with commissionRate validation
        Parameters:
        firstName - First name of a programmer.
        lastName - Last name of a programmer.
        socialSecurityNumber - Social Security Number of a programmer.
        wage - Hourly wage of a programmer.
        hours - Total hours the programmer worked.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
        • If the wage gets a value less than 0.
        • If the hour gets a value less than 0 or more than 168.
